thread.title: AOL Buys Millennial Media for $248 Million, Advances Mobile-Ad March
thread.title_full: AOL Buys Millennial Media for $248 Million, Advances Mobile-Ad March

title: AOL Buys Millennial Media for $248 Million, Advances Mobile-Ad March
text:
Get Business & Technology Alerts 
4 Sep 2015 02:09 AM EST 
AOL has struck a deal to acquire Millennial Media, a provider of mobile-advertising technology and services, in a deal worth about $248 million in cash. AOL — which Verizon Communications acquired this year for $4.4 billion — is offering $1.75 per share of Millennial Media common stock, a 31% premium over Millennial’s closing stock price Wednesday. AOL president Bob Lord said in announcing the pact that as consumers spend more time on mobile devices, advertisers, agencies and publishers have shifted more advertising dollars to target those users.
